desc: All things Handmade. Home Decor & Apparels inspired-derived from Traditional Indian Textiles. Exploring the versatility of Crafts of India. Find Cushions, Table Linen, Dupattas, Dress material & many more at just one Stop.

layout.text: Handmade Fabric Bookmarks!! Pretty, Simple, Unique & Affordable Bookmarks for all Book Lovers out there...
